body.name: MUJOO Pink Rugs for Bedroom Girls 3'x5' Rug Boho Area Rug for Living Room Small Washable Rug Cute Rugs Non Slip Throw Carpet for Bedside Dorm Shower Room Nursery Soft Light Pink Floral Home Decor
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 31 mins
features: FOLDABLE PINK AREA RUG:This pink carpet can be used as a vibrant and fresh pink room decor to transform bedroom,living room,entryway or kids room.The 3x5 rug can be folded without leaving creases for easy storage.Ultra soft, low-pile,absorbent and durable,this 3x5 rug can be used in heavy traffic areas of your home without blocking the door opening.

MACHINE WASHABLE AREA RUGS:The 3'x5' rug can be washed in the washing machine, will not fade and can be reused.Small rug can be dried at low temperature or high temperature in 220 degrees.The dust hairs on the rug also can use vacuum cleaner to clear, clean convenient.

NON-SLIP AREA RUG: The pink rug back adopts unique chain glue design to make the rug more non slip and better grip.Boho washable rug is used directly without additional padding.Lock edge reinforced ,super durable, not easy to be decomposed.

TIMELESS DESIGNS:Bedroom rug contains elements of Vintage,Boho,Oriental,Aztec,Faded,Moroccan,Traditional,Modern, Classic,Shabby Retro Chic and more;Washable rug fits most interior designs and make the room more designed.

MULTI-PURPOSE:Washable rugs 3x5 is a fluffy,low-pile design that is soft enough for children and pets.Now use this light pink rug as room carpet to make your home feel more homey,or as a bedroom rug,entryway rug,indoor rug,entry rug,bathroom rug,living room rug,shower rug,kitchen rug,laundry room rug,office rug is also a good choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love that this rug came folded and compact but laid flat from the get go! Beautiful colors and soft!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful great rug
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful rug, the color is great. I put it beside my bed and it is so soft. Great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful but Not Quite Pink
reviews.reviewText: This is really a beautiful lightweight but sturdy throw rug, and I highly recommend it. BUT it’s definitely not pink, and it’s definitely not the color showing up on my photo! It’s actually beautiful salmon/coral tones which, luckily, are in the print of my couch & loveseat!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I have small children so I guess I should have considers this when I bought this rug for the living room. It’s pretty but not practical for us because I’ve cleaned it about once a week since I got it and it just looks bad now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and soft
reviews.reviewText: I recently moved and there was no carpeting throughout the entire place so I wanted to get rugs for certain parts of the house. This one was for my living room and it looks beautiful. When it comes to look,make and feel it def does not come off cheap or inexpensive at all. It is about the length of a loveseat maybe a bit longer and the thickness is thin but not paper thin. The rug is really soft too my kids all love it and I've seen them at times just laying or rubbing their feet on it. The colors are beautiful as well I am going for a neutral color scheme like creams and light wood and so far it is looking just how I imagined it would. I think my only complaint is because I need more of it that I wish it was a bit bigger both in length and width but other than this I think this would be a wonderful piece to add to any home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these washable rugs.
reviews.reviewText: The rug looks great. It's lightweight and easy to maneuver. Even though it's on the thinner side, the material is durable and well constructed. The design print is vivid and the pattern is clearly visible throughout. I like the fade like effect throughout the design that gives it a bit of age and character. The great thing about these rugs are the fact that they can be washed. Depending on the size, it may be a bit too big for a home washing machine but it is certainly worth an occasional trip to a commercial laundromat to clean the rug as needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light weight and extremely soft
reviews.reviewText: We have a large room that we recently had redone from carpeting to hardwood. We’d left the floor bare, but I’d been thinking that it might be a bit cold this coming winter. I love the hardwoods and didn’t want to cover them with a large area rug. I decided I’d be happier with one or two smaller throw rugs, so I chose this pink one as a start. The listing says it’s light pink, but I would describe it as more of a bold saturated pink with almost a salmon shade to it. It’s pretty, but definitely a pop of color.I received it folded so there were some significant creases in it. My first thought was to lay it out on the floor and hope the folds relaxed on their own. That just wasn’t happening, so I decided to go ahead and put it in the washer and dryer. I followed the washing instructions, and it did great. There were no more creases or fold lines, and washing it fluffed it up a bit.It’s not a thick, heavy rug and it has a very low pile, so it doesn’t provide a cushiony surface to walk across. It’s extremely soft though, and almost velvety when you walk on it barefooted. It adds a lot of visual warmth to the room and has a rubber-like backing so it stays in place well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars cozy office rug
reviews.reviewText: I couldn't be happier with my recent purchase of this super cute rug for my tiny 9ft x 7ft studio office. Not only does it perfectly match my office aesthetic, but it's also incredibly soft, making it a cozy addition to my workspace.With hardwood floors in my office, the rug serves a practical purpose by providing much-needed insulation during the colder fall and winter months. It's like a warm, welcoming hug for my feet. Having rugs on hardwood floors is an absolute must, and this one does the job beautifully.What's even more impressive is the convenience it offers. The fact that it's vacuumable and machine washable is a game-changer. I've put it to the test, and it comes out looking as good as new. It's such a relief to know that keeping it clean and fresh is a breeze.In summary, this rug not only elevates the aesthetic of my office but also serves a functional purpose, keeping my feet warm and comfortable. It's a must-have for anyone with hardwood floors. Plus, its easy maintenance makes it a practical and stylish addition to any space.
